title: Non-Repetitive Puzzles
description: The core of Valley of Shadow is solving puzzles. Rather than solving multiple iterations of the same puzzle over and over with increasing difficulty, we believe that each puzzle should be unique and challenging.

title: Spells with Side Effects
description: Valley of Shadow explores the side effects of the most popular spells in fantasy - such as Light, Force Missile, and Fireball. Sure, a fireball can blast your enemies apart. But it can also ignite wood, or turn water to steam. Solve puzzles using these side effects.

title: Meaningful Exploration
description: Players who want to explore the world should be rewarded for doing so. Not only with vistas, but with actual content as well. Every corner you turn will hold something for you, whether it's a hidden puzzle, a key to the narrative, or an easter egg.
